#1.a
```{r}
IM1<-2147483563
IM2<-2147483399
IMM1<-IM1-1
IA1<-40014
IA2<-40692
IQ1<-53668
IQ2<-52774
IR1<-12211
IR2<-3791
NTAB<-32
NDIV<-as.integer(1+IMM1/NTAB)
AM<-1.0/IM1
EPS<-1.2e-7
RNMX<-1.-EPS
idum2<-123456789
idum<--1000
numran<-100
ran2<-0
iy<-0
iv<-rep(0,NTAB)
random<-rep(0,numran)
icount<-1
for(icount in 1:numran){
  if(idum<=0){
    idum<-max(-idum,1)
    idum2<-idum
    j<-NTAB+8
    while(j>0){
      k=as.integer(idum/IQ1)                            
      idum<-IA1*(idum-k*IQ1)-k*IR1
      if(idum<0){
        idum=idum+IM1
      }
      if(j<=NTAB){
        iv[j]<-idum
      }
      j<-j-1
    }
    iy<-iv[1]
  }
  k<-as.integer(idum/IQ1) 
  idum<-IA1*(idum-k*IQ1)-k*IR1
  if(idum<0){idum=idum+IM1}
  k<-as.integer(idum2/IQ2) 
  idum2<-IA2*(idum2-k*IQ2)-k*IR2
  if(idum2<0){idum2=idum2+IM2}
  j<-as.integer(iy/NDIV)+1
  
  iy<-iv[j]-idum2
  iv[j]<-idum2
  
  if(iy<1){iy<-iy+IMM1}
  ran2<-min(AM*iy,RNMX)
  random[icount]<-ran2
  icount<-icount+1
}
```

```{r}
a0<-2.50662823884
a1<--18.61500062529
a2<-41.39119773534
a3<--25.44106049637

b0<--8.47351093090
b1<-23.08336743743
b2<--21.06224101826
b3<-3.13082909833

c0<-0.3374754822726147
c1<-0.9761690190917186
c2<-0.1607979714918209
c3<-0.0276438810333863
c4<-0.0038405729373609
c5<-0.0003951896511919
c6<-0.0000321767881768
c7<-0.0000002888167364
c8<-0.0000003960315187

jcount<-1
rany<-rep(0,numran)
while(jcount<=numran){
u<-ranx[jcount]
y<-u-0.5
if (abs(y)<0.42){
  r<-y*y
  x<-y*(((a3*r+a2)*r+a1)*r+a0)/((((b3*r+b2)*r+b1)*r+b0)*r+1)
}else{
    r<-u
    if(y>0){
      r<-1-u
    }
    r<-log(-log(r))
    x<-c0+r*(c1+r*(c2+r*(c4+r*(c5+r*(c6+r*(c7+r*(c8)))))))
    if(y<0){x<--x}
}
  rany[jcount]<-x
  jcount=jcount+1
}
```

#implied vol by BSM
```{r}
#MY last name end with 'N'
# Calculating Implied Volatility
#1.NIVDIA SEP,18
S0<-245.62
Strike<-260
rf<-0.05
T=177/365
# Assume
TruePrice <- 39.25
#
# Solving for Implied Volatility
#
guess1<-0.1
d1<-(log(S0/Strike)+(rf+0.5*guess1^2)*T)/(guess1*sqrt(T))
d2<-d1-guess1*sqrt(T)
Nd1<-pnorm(d1, mean=0, sd=1)
Nd2<-pnorm(d2, mean=0, sd=1)
price1<-S0*Nd1-Strike*exp(-rf*T)*Nd2
#
icount<-1
guess2<-1
 
while(icount < 100) {
d1<-(log(S0/Strike)+(rf+0.5*guess2^2)*T)/(guess2*sqrt(T))
d2<-d1-guess2*sqrt(T)
Nd1<-pnorm(d1, mean=0, sd=1)
Nd2<-pnorm(d2, mean=0, sd=1)
price2<-S0*Nd1-Strike*exp(-rf*T)*Nd2

guessnew<-(((guess1-guess2)/(price1-price2))*(TruePrice-price2)) + (guess2)


diffg<-abs(guessnew - guess2)

if(diffg<0.0001) break
#
# Liner Interpolation - assume constant slope:
# (guess1-guess2)/(price1-price2) =
# (guessnew-guess2)/(TruePrice-price2)
# Solve for guessnew and calculate
#

#cat("Iteration #",icount,"\n")
#cat("Guess1 ->",guess1, "Guess2 ->",guess2,"GuessNew#guessnew,"\n")
#cat("Price1 ->",price1, "Price2 ->",price2,"TruePrice ->",TruePrice,"\n")
#
guess1<-guess2
price1<-price2
guess2<-guessnew
icount<-icount+1
}
cat("Final Iteration #",icount,"\n")
cat("Implied Volatility =",guessnew*100,"%","\n")
cat("Estimated Price",price2,"\n")
```
